title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge app intelligence using gen AI with Amazon DocumentDB (DAT313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon DocumentDB 通过生成式 AI 增强应用智能 (DAT313)
abstract: In this session, explore how you can use the generative AI capabilities of Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibility) to make your existing applications more powerful. See demos showcasing how easily you can implement semantic search, build chatbots, and execute ML predictions within Amazon DocumentDB.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索如何使用 Amazon DocumentDB（兼容 MongoDB）的生成式 AI 功能，使您现有的应用程序更加强大。观看演示，了解如何在 Amazon DocumentDB 中轻松实现语义搜索、构建聊天机器人以及执行机器学习预测。
